title: S13 Ep141: Locking Down the Paranormal with Katrina Weidman
itunes:title: Locking Down the Paranormal with Katrina Weidman
description:
Beyond The Darkness sits down to a Sunday conversation with Paranormal Lockdown's Katrina Weidman! We talk about the making of season three, some of her favorite new equipment to use on investigation, how her perspective on the paranormal has changed over the years and much more!

Check out past seasons of Paranormal Lockdown: https://www.destinationamerica.com/tv-shows/paranormal-lockdown/

Catch up with all of Katrina's Social Media here! https://www.katrinaweidman.com/
